name: Dev's Toy: Sokoban
description:
A little toy for game developers.  Quickly iterate between design and playtesting in this game/tool designed to tackle the design process with a playful attitude.

You can save the levels you create as images on your computer and share them with anyone.

The game is (almost) finished. I've been meaning to return and polish some rough edges for more than a year, but I haven't had the time to do it. So I finally decided to publish it.
